tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Hi, My names Chris and i would like to give you a brief insight or history of dental work I've had completed over the last 15 odd years and a testimonial on dental work that has just today been completed at Smile Again Dental Clinic at East Dadar in Mumbai India. By the time i was 45 i had been suffering numerous dental problems and had about 8 teeth missing from both the upper and lower jaw, luckily for me they were all back teeth and not visible from the front. Over the next 5 or so years these problems continued and led me to having more teeth removed and bridges fitted to both jaws. Over the next 9 years I had root canals completed, more teeth removed and the upper bridge had to be shortened. Then in  February this year the lower bridge broke away   due failing teeth. By this time I had had enough of constant dental work, minimal time between infections, pain etc. Amongst other things i could no longer smile, chew food and felt pretty miserable and embarrassed by it all. Knowing that removable plastic like dentures for the want of a better mame which I wasn't keen on were my only affordable option In Australia i decided to look overseas and find what was available. I then had some scans of my upper and lower jaw taken and sent these to different dental clinics in 3 countries I had chosen from my researching the internet.   From the replies, phone calls, quotes etc and further research I decided that India was were I would be heading. By the time I was ready to go I had been in contact with 10 clinics in India and had narrowed it down to 6, I made appointments with the 6 clinics for the 1st week to feel them out, get quotes and see what they suggested, of the 6 one was discounted at the 1st appointment leaving 5. After follow up appointments another 3 were discounted. I then chose Smile Again for numerous reasons such as professionalism, truthfulness, clinic amenities and general feeling about the staff and Dr Amit. Well after 2 visits over 6 months I have finished my treatment and couldn't be more happier with the results. I would like to thank Dr Amit and the staff for everything and am contactable through the Dr if you want further information from me.

Thank you Dr Dhruti and Dr Amit for giving me my smile back! Together you make a great team and have been extremely caring & compassionate, and have the desire to make your patients happy with the results.

I visited Smile Again - my first visit to a dentist ever - to get my teeth cleaned and get dental braces. A true professional that he is, Dr Amit Chavan patiently made me aware of several of my persistent dental problems, which I had been practically ignoring my entire life. He listened to my concerns and addressed them in a compassionate and professional manner. Later based on the tests and dental x-rays, he recommended Cosmetic Dentistry as an alternative to dental braces.

This is when Dr Dhruti Raut Chavan stepped in to give me a complete transformation, that too in just 4 sittings. Thank you! I owe you a big one for putting the smile back on my face at the age of 40... true to the name of your clinic 'Smile Again'!

To top it, Smile Again is very clean and nicely organized. What's also noteworthy is the sunny yellow coloured interiors that exude warmth and instantly cheers you up and the amazing fan at the reception that's symbolic of the mouth mirror - very conceptual and piece of art! also, the whole staff is super friendly and make you feel comfortable during your whole visit.

You will always be my dentist, and even though I will be living hundreds of miles away, I will come down to Smile Again, for all of my dental needs. 

Thank you for always smiling and for spreading smiles :)

Warm regards and best wishes always,
Sarita

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The last place I ever wanted to visit was a dental clinic simply because of the fear and pain I might have to go thru, be it cleaning, extraction or setting my broken teeth right. 
Post two months I can clearly say I was proved wrong in my assessment simply because the warmth extended by Dr Amit Chavan and Dr Lubaina Tapia and their team of professional assistants who made me feel at home while undergoing the treatment.
My treatment which involved cleaning, extraction of two teeth (never knew when it was pulled out ðŸ˜Š) and the modification of the teeth to prepare for the bridge was smooth, painless, and clean. Kudos to Dr Lubaina who is a thorough professional at her work, understand the patientâ€™s requirement and treats accordingly. 
During the initial consultation with Dr Amit Chavan he took me through the entire process involved in setting my teeth right, and I thought it was great in terms of giving me the much-required confidence.
Overall a superb experience and my gratitude towards Dr Amit Chavan, Dr Lubaina Tapia and the team of assistants who took care of me and gave a fantastic experience and more importantly removed the fear in me in the first sitting.   
Thank You once again to give back my SMILE ðŸ˜Š

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I was initially apprehensive about receiving dental treatment outside of my home country. However these fears were allayed as the facility is a modern and well equipped centre. Dr Amit examined and concluded that I needed a root canal filling but would need to be done at a later date in order to commence with some prep.
I attended the second session to commence the root canal filling, dr Hitesh carried out this part of the treatment. The thouroness of the work was fantastic and I had minimal/no pain during this period.
The the next part of the treatment was to insert.the cement onto the filling and complete the root filling, this was carried out by Dr. Lubaina and she was excellent in doing this phase of the treatment and also explained the work being done and also advices on the nest stage that needed to be done, this was to place a cap on the filling. Unfortunately I was unable to have the cap inserted to to my insufficient time in Mumbai.
I would like to thank Drâ€™s Amit, Hitesh, Lubaina and all the wonderful supporting staff.
I would have no reservation in recommending Dr. Amit and his team for dental care.

I booked for the first time through Practo when i felt my tooth had chipped off. I was very pleased the way the appointment went through this app.
I selected a vicinity close to my residence for the treatment needed, on visiting i was treated in a very professional manner on recommendation to go in for a root canal i opted for it and spoke to Dr. Amit himself who explained me the process in detail . I was given a package of Rs.3500/- plus the cap as per choice and told this would take around two to three turns . I found this figure a bit on the higher side and discussed the same with the doctor who gave me confidence saying this is the best they can do. Looking at the clinic i opted for it and there started my first seating at the end of a 45 minute seating i was told to pay Rs.3700/- which i paid without arguing. Day before i was scheduled for my next appointment so i also took my mom along who had a tooth issue too,I finished my seating and left for work and my mom was also recommended a same treatment which she too opted for. Yesterday i had two appointments one at 11am the other at 12am so my mom opted to take the first slot and when i was about to reach there i got a call saying my appointment is postponed for 1pm in turn i said wont be able to make it then and choose to go today . On date after my seating i was asked to pay Rs.1800/- on which i argued and was told these are additional charges for x-ray etc , in turn i said i was given a package saying this is an all inclusive package excluding the cap, due to Dr. Amit not being present they called him up and he instructed them i had to pay , without creating any nuisance i paid up and said i wont be keen taking my treatment further with them and left. I received a call form Dr. Amit saying he will recheck why was not told about the additional cost and course and assured me a call back from the clinic which i received but to my surprise it was to check whats the call taken for my moms tooth cap , neither i was offered a refund nor got an apology . Found this very unreal and worth putting up so all users and Practo  can be aware that such small things hammer the reputation of a firm and the provider. Have no grudges against anyone in here just a lesson learnt so sharing .
The treatment on the whole and the clinic ambience is good , but looking at these issues i chose to continue with some one who can stand and abide by their words and is more transparent in dealing , this i guess is the thumb rule in any service related consumer sovereign market !

Had an appointment at 12 pm. Was attended to at 1 pm. But it was worth the wait when you sit in an air conditioned atmosphere with soothing music playing in the background. I would have waited another 2 hours. Finally got my impressions taken by the docs wife who is a jawline / teeth bone specialist. Feeling much better pain wise and the surgery healing well. Thanks to the doc's at smile again clinic. An advice for the faint hearted, pain fearing guys/girls, visit this clinic if you ever want to ' 'SMILE AGAIN' broadly and pain freely.

I have been going to Dr. Chavan from a year now for dental problems, and recently got my root canal treatment done here as well. This was a fairly complex issue as this cavity had been there for a while in one of my central incisor. They were very friendly since the start and made sure I was comfortable during the entire process. Dr. Dhruti, Dr. Amit and their entire staff is very hard working and flexible for the patient. They were always available at convenient timings during weekends, considering my hectic travelling schedule during weekdays. The final result of the crown implant is an exact match with my other incisors, which was something I was very skeptical at the beginning, however the result is outstanding! It has also resulted in my teeth being more aligned than what it was before.

Please do give them a visit in case of any dental issues, theyâ€™re one of the very  qualified, friendly and hard working doctors Iâ€™ve come across in Mumbai.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Crowns,Dental X-Ray,Laser Gum Surgery,
review:
Dr. Amit and Dr. Lubaina were wonderful both as doctors and people. They were extremely patient and very accommodating. 
I went for a Root canal and aching tooth. Which went perfectly, no questions asked. Looking at the comfort I felt in their dental care I opted to change my other crowns. They did a very thorough replacement of my old filling before changing the crowns.

They even accommodated my requests when I had to leave urgently and wanted to prepone my treatment.
I would have given them a hug and a thanks if not for Corona.

I would highly recommend them at Smile Again Dadar East.

Infact the nurse staff are also wonderful and were extremely welcoming. 

A big thanks to everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr. Amit for tooth gap and filling. First of all clinic is very spick and span, interior of the clinic is so positive that your fear of visiting clinic (and scary instruments ) goes out immediately. Dr Amit has an eye for detail, explained the problem minutely and advised the treatment. Doctor makes you so comfortable with his approach that you tend to feel problem is less.He also advised long term view of taking care of teeth. Overall I would strongly recommend the professionalism and 10 out of 10 rating. Approach to clinic is very easy and it is 100 meters from Dadar station (east)

review:
I have been visiting clinic from last one year and had too much issues with my teeth almost all teeth .. But luckily I found Smile Again I have been explained By Dr. Dhruti and Dr.Amit what exactly has to be done and how my smile can be enhanced in more proper manner. Have gone through almost all treatment which was of course all painless treatments and all doctors were more gentle and proficient in their work.
Specially Dr.Dhruti is my all time favourite, She is very sweet and caring.
I was almost conscious about my smile one year ago and now I smile everyday without any consciousness because smile again actually made me smile again. Also staff of clinic is very much friendly, sweet and courteous and the follow up is always at its best. I would recommend Dr. Dhruti and Dr. Amit Chavan for dentals issues as both of them are Very proficient and also good by nature.

Thanks Smile Again !!! ðŸ˜ŠðŸ˜Š

I would visit again for sure!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Month ago I got strong pain of my teeth, so I did x-ray and found out that I have problems with 2 wisdom teeth and I have to remove it. As I'm foreigner here, so it's quite hard to find good clinic, I had to do surgery and of coutse I was quite afraid. One of my friends suggest me  practo, so i checked some clinics and made appointment in Smile Again. On the fist visit I just had checking, so doctor explained me in details what kind of problems I have and we made appointment on surgery visit. The surgery was painless, I had local anastesia so I was even abkle to observe what kind of instruments does doctor use. It's already one week - I do nkt have pain, I only had swollen cheek for the first 3 days,but now it's ok.
It was absolutely positive experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
This dental clinic has truly professional doctors and staff members. All are very caring and transparent about the course of treatment you will be going through. I and my family members have several RCTs done here and the experience has been very pleasant all the time. 

Thank you Dr. Amit and your team for making it very friendly for the dental patients.

Before visiting SmileAgain I did round of dentists but wasn't confident about the treatment offered. While surfing internet I came across SmileAgain dental clinic. The website is very impressive so decided to visit the clinic. To my surprise the clinic too is very lively and clean, Dr.Amit is a genius. He was very transparent about the treatment and pricing. Everything was explained to me before starting the treatment. 2 Root canals, 2crowns and 4 Cosmetic fillings all went very smoothly without any discomfort. I was really very happy with the service given by Dr.Amit and his wonderful team. Kudos to you guys. 
Thanking you.
Another happy patient.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: This clinic is really well taken care of The amount of hygiene and cleanliness that they've taken to account to keep the clinic up to standards of international hygiene is amazing. They have a good team of doctors We evaluate the problem and share the diagnosis with the patient which is something I really appreciate after having experiences from other doctors who want to just allocate a treatment to get more revenue  out of their patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My colleague recommended me Dr.Amit for wisdom tooth extraction. And I couldn't thank her enough. Dr.Amit is very friendly and explains the treatment plan thoroughly. The clinic is very clean, well-equipped and their staff is very helpful and prompt.  I will definitely recommend going to Smile Again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Always had a fear of a dentist. But I couldn't bear the pain therefore searched for a dentist on practo.   I came to smile again where Dr Amit explained the whole procedure and assured me that it would be a painless root canal. Just a few sittings and it was done. Thanks to Dr Amit Chavan and his team of smile again. Highly recommended.

I was having this problem since a month. Then somebody told me about Dr.Amit. Dr. Amit patiently heard my problem.  
* **** **** *** **** *** * ***** ********* *** ** ********* ** ******** *

Also Doctor explained to me the reason of my problems and started my treatment . 
I must really thank Dr. Amit for the cure and relief from my immense pain . 

I will definitely recommend Dr. Amit

I loved the way they have taken precautions for the COVID. The process seemed very smooth with minimal waiting time. I had gone for a check-up and thought would require to visit there again for the actual work but the treatment was done in 1 and half hours and the results look flawless. Kudos to the team.

Dr. Hitesh who performed root canal for me was excellent and it was a painless experience for me.
Dr. Suhasini who took measurements and installed crown on my teeth was exceptional and very patient since crown takes lot of time and efforts to install properly.
And I have to thank Dr Amit for explaining things very clearly at the beginning and what to expect in the various sittings.
Highly recommend Smile Again clinic for all Dental problems.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review: I was terrified about dentists in general and used to avoid visiting dentists if i could help it! But my experience at Smile Again kind of changed my impression... i had an easy, pleasant and painless experience on all my sittings... and moreover the coordination and service is exemplary. My Doctor was very sweet and efficient.. and i would definitely come back here and reccommend Smile Again to others!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
**** *** ** *** **** ***** *** *** **** ** ****** ********* Doctors are very friendly. Specially doctor amit and mohini to understand the concerns and addressing with best treatment.  I would recommend my friends and family for smile again.

Specially woulld like to thanks again to doctor mohini *** ****** **** ********* and Dr.Amit and entire smile again team.

I'm glad to choose smile again..thanks a lot

Fantastic experience overall. Got 2 root canals done. Barely took 1 painkiller during the entire process. Extremely friendly staff and truly competitive prices. Above all, the doctors were friendly *** ****** *******. Special mention of Dr Amit who explained the treatment in great detail lucidly, and Dr Pratha for her patience and skill in ensuring pain free treatment. :)

Dentistry dedicated to excellence. I was made to feel at ease, a lovely friendly environment with amazing helpful people. Hearty thanks to Dr Amit and Dr Mohini for attending to me.  The entire staff was supportive and took excellent care. I had a bit anxiety for doing the  RCT, the entire team made me feel relaxed and everything went exemplary. I would recommend 'Smile Again' to all those who want a painless and perfect treatment for teeth.

Doctor Amit and doctor Jay r very excellent doctors.Within one and a year., I saw my daughters
Look completely changed.I am very much happy
with the compliments that she received. All credit 
goes to doctor Amit , doctor Jay and dr Suhasni.I would recommend everyone to visit here for any 
dental problems.Once u come , you will get your smile back again...
Lots of good luck and blessings to all the Smile Again Staff.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: A super professional and friendly family-run practice. I had extensive treatment over a period of 3 weeks and extremely pleased with the entire experience. The pracitice is up to UK standards yet prices are a fraction of the cost! I would thoroughly recommend and intend to return for more treatment when next in Mumbai. Thank you everyone!

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr Amit was very helpful in explaining me the dental procedure and the related risks. I was running short on time due to travel commitments. He created a timeline which accommodated the required procedure with my strict schedule. I would recommend him for a professional dental treatment solution in the future.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
context: Orthodontic Procedures,Cosmetic/ Aesthetic Dentistry,Dental Surgery,Smile Designing,
review: My experience at Smile Again with Dr. Amit Chavan worked out to be very ********* *** efficient as my case was not only fairly extensive, but also time sensitive. All procedures were completed in a very timely manner by a professional and courteous staff; I never felt that I was not a priority. The quality of service and the tools/meathods used were top notch and I am very satisfied with the results. I would  definitely recommend Smile Again to anyone seeking a wide range of treatments including general dentistry, orthodontic, and cosmetic as I had in my case.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Amit is rendering priceless  and invaluable services to his patients and that that too devotedly & lovingly

Outstanding work and I'm very happy with Dr. Suhasini, I have told so many people about this clinic.... Thank you so much Team Smile Again... I am grateful to my brother for referring me to this clinic..... The receptionist and staff are very friendly and welcoming too....

This is my second visit after 2 years, Very comfortable treatment, very homely environment, was kept at ease throughout my treatment, very helpful and supportive staff, thank you for the wonderful experience Smile Again, will definitely recommend to everyone I know

A doctor is visited so that a patient gets an instant relief from his/her pain. The doctor did not care to subscribe me any medicine for the pain I was suffering from. They charged â‚¹200 for consultation but did not provide me a prescription and â‚¹400 for OPG  but did not provide me a hard copy of the x ray.

Excellent service in a well maintained clinic with a very helpful and cheerful staff.I had rootcanal done which was done painlessly and I more confident in coming back for any of my dental issues.Thank you Dr.amit for all you support and suggestions.

It was very nice. I was recommended veneers. Had not heard about it before and was pleasantly surprised that could be done in such short duration. Doctors Amit and Dhruti lived up to their promise and got the treatment done in a very short span. I was also made very comfortable on every visit.I would recommend this clinic to everyone

Fear of meeting dentist ends here. Extremely courteous staff always welcoming you with a smile. Trained and professional dentist who will put u at ease and suggest correct and needed treatment. Dr amit chavan and team are going to be our family dentist!!

Very patient friendly team of doctors. Cleared all doubts n fears about the braces that arouse in my daughter's little mind. Conveinced her that there wl be very minimum pain n problem if any. Guided her well thru her treatment which is almost getting over in a few months.  Now it is she who is suggesting the team to our friends n relatives.

Excellent treatment, absolutely painless. Placed couple of implants, one root canal and metal free crown. Smile again is a place for patients like me who have immense fear for dentist. Dr Amit made sure that all my treatment was absolutely pain free. I highly recommend all the team of doctors, it makes a huge difference when all the team of doctors are MDS in thier respected fields and all the latest technology comes as boon to all patients. Thank u team smileagin

Going to a dentist is one of the most scary thing for me. Wanted to do my root canal treatment. But after coming to Smile Again that fear disappeared as Dr Amit Chavan very minutely explained me the treatment which was absolutely painless. Thanks to Dr Amit and his team of Smile Again.

I had a very good experience. All doctors are very friendly and nice. Many times they adjusted the time as per my schedule due to my office work etc .This is very good experience for me and also I will recommend to others also .All supporting staff are also very nice and co-operative. 

I like to thanks all members for my dental treatment.


Thanks with regards,



                                                                            (Sanjay Gedam)

It was a nice experience. Everything was arranged very swiftly. My 5yr old son was suffering from toothache n he needed root canal treatment. One phone call made difference. Dr n timing was arranged. Every time we got a reminder message. Dr was very co operative. My son didn't cry n is fine now.

Dr. Amit was very helpful $ explained things with lot of patience. He $ his team has an expertise in dealing with anxiety patients like me. The implants on both sides were done with very minimal discomfort $ pain. Three cheers to Smile Again.
Thank You

                                                                                                  U S A

An amazing experience esp given the fact that I went to Dr. Amit with an RC gone bad. 
I, to my pleasant surprise,  experienced no pain during the RC  procedure at his clinic. 
The staff was most courteous and Dr. Amit himself made sure that I'm at ease and well informed about my tooth condition. 
I highly recommend Dr. Amit and his team.

Came to smile again dental clinic after my husbands treatment and under his strong recommendation. Had to undergo a root canal which got chills to me but doctor amit assured me it will be painless procedure and to my surprise it was. No pain at all. Did metal free crown couple of fillings and scaling. Now yet another happy patient of smile again. Thank you.

I had a severe toothache, so I came to smile again dental clinic. Dr Amit advised me root canal treatment. Actually initially I was scared about root canal but actually to my surprise it was absolutely painless. The clinic is very spacious and well equipped with modern technologies and pleasant ambience. All the doctors and staff are very good and cooperative.
Thank you.
Dr Amit.

The doctors and their team at Smile Again have done an excellent job with the root canal treatment that I went through.
Dr Amit made me feel comfortable during the treatment. The treatment went very smoothly. The clinic is very clean and spacious. The ambience are excellent. The instruments sterilized.Friendly staff and comfortable timing adjustment. I will recommend about the clinic to all my friends and family.
Best of luck to team Smile Again.

From the outset, the dental treatment I received was very professional and inviting. I was very impressed with the professionalism of the service. The clinic ambience is very colourful and soothing. The staff is always smiling. The cleanliness and quality control was cherry on top. Overall it was a pleasing experience. I have already recommended this clinic to my friends and family. 
Thanks a lot Dr. Amit

Had come to the clinic for root canal and then a beautiful metal free crown.The doctors treatment was great, absolutely painless. The staff is friendly. The ambience is excellent. The clinic is very hygienic. Even the instruments used are sterilized with pouch and sealers so they maintain utmost hygiene to prevent cross contamination of infections. Will definitely advise my friends and family for any dental treatment.

The worst part of visiting a dental clinic is the innate fear of something bad. Doctor Amit not only ensured that I have stress and pain free treatment, but also helped me fight that fear. Cordial conversations, helpful smiling staff, and Hitech equipments also helped me have avery good treatment so far. 
I will definitely come again for regular check ups and also recommend to others.

I am a happy patient of smile again had come to this clinic to get a broken tooth extracted and get a bridge fitted in its place .The good things was that from the beginning I was told only the truth and nothing like running around the Bush .Expert advice was given from the smallest thing to the most Complex.I liked that there existed a friend to friend attitude rather than Doctor- patient .The experience was worth remembering .everything right from the smallest complain about pain to getting the entire procedure done was absolutely awesome .would highly recommended this clinic to anyone who needs a visit to the dentist leaving as another happy customer.

When I met Dr.Amit and Dr.Dhruti their confidence and knowledge about cosmetic dentistry appealed much to me to go ahead with the pending decision since 3 years. I underwent smile makeover with laminate veneers of my front 6 teeth and the result is just outstanding. I got back my long last smile thanks to Dr.Amit and Dr. Dhruti. I am more than impressed with Smile Again clinic and wish more success to Dr.Amit in days to come!
